ygData.subject: Re: Sister Bandit near Faydark
ygData.msgSnippet: The sister camp i m talking about is in lesser faydark at the coordinates, Negative 760, Positive 2600. There are 4 bandits there, and they spawn level 12-15 i
ygData.messageBody:
The sister camp i'm talking about is in lesser faydark at the coordinates,
Negative 760, Positive 2600. There are 4 bandits there, and they spawn level
12-15 i think. Bronze weapon loads there, but not as frequent as in a
Dervish camp. But the xp's not bad, and as there is a shop very close by,
coodinates, Negative 280, Positive 1260, it is ideal for a hunting place.
-----Original Message-----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: 'sg-everquest@onelist.com' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, June 17, 1999 6:22 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Sister Bandit near Faydark


>From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
>Pai seh to disappoint u, only bronze weap I think, hehe.
>
>Btw, wat so great abt bronze armor, cost 120pp?
>

>> >
>> > Ziltus
